privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Notice
privacyPolicy.introduction: This privacy notice applies to Flyttman AB (hereinafter referred to as "Flyttman", "we", "us" or "our") and explains how and why we collect, use, store, and/or share ("process") personal information when you use our services ("Services"), such as:
introductionPoints: Contacting us via email or phone
Using our moving and transport services
Participating in promotions, events, or other marketing activities

consent.title: Your Consent
consent.content: By using our services or visiting our website, you consent to the collection, use, and processing of your personal data in accordance with this policy. If you do not agree to the terms, please refrain from using our services or website.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.content: We may collect the following types of information:
points: Contact details: Name, email address, phone number, address
Moving details: Move date, address information, volume estimates, services requested
Technical data: IP address, browser type, device info, cookies
Communication: Messages, quote requests, and other correspondence

usage.title: How We Use the Information
usage.content: We use the information we collect to:
points: Communicate with you regarding your move
Send relevant updates, news, or promotions
Improve our website, services, and user experience

sharing.title: Information Sharing
sharing.content: We do not share your personal data with third parties, except in the following cases:
points: With subcontractors assisting us in carrying out the move (e.g., storage facilities, extra personnel)
With payment service providers or invoicing partners
Where required by law or legal proceedings
With your consent for specific purposes

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking
cookies.content: We use cookies to enhance functionality and analyze usage behavior on our website. By using our site, you consent to our use of cookies. You can adjust your cookie settings at any time in your browser.

security.title: Data Security
security.content: We have implemented technical and organizational measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, loss, or misuse.
security.additional: You are responsible for securing your communication with us. We advise against sending sensitive data via unencrypted email.

changes.title: Changes to This Policy
changes.content: We may update this privacy notice from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page and become effective immediately. We recommend reviewing this policy regularly.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: If you have any questions about this privacy notice or how we handle your personal data, please contact us:

hero.title: Sweden's most reliable moving companies
hero.description:
We provide safe and efficient moving services across the entire country – with national coverage and local expertise, we offer personalized relocation solutions, careful handling of your belongings, and competitive pricing. 
Our support is available 24/7 to ensure you feel secure throughout the entire moving process.

items.title: Dedication

items.title: Quality

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Have questions? Here are quick answers to help with your move.

items.question: When do I need to book?
items.answer: Book well in advance, preferably 3-4 weeks in advance for good planning. What happens if I'm out at the last minute? We solve most things 24/7 so fill in the request and a quick quote will come.

items.question: Personal contact with a moving guy?
items.answer: Yes, you have throughout the moving process. But start by filling out a free request so we can provide the correct quote with a fixed price.

items.question: Are you moving throughout Sweden?
items.answer: Yes, we move throughout Sweden locally in most places but also further from north to south every week as we are a network of moving companies with large capacity all over Sweden.

items.question: What is included in the quotation price?
items.answer: All prices are fixed and are provided on the information you have provided in your request. We will still help you if something is added on the day of the move as services or volume, this is counted as an additional service.

items.question: How do I prepare before moving day?
items.answer: Clean and throw away what is not to be taken to the new home. Pack everything that goes in moving boxes. Feel free to label boxes with porcelain. Duvets and the like in garbage bags. Put away personal items. Then we solve the rest.

about.title: About Us – Flyttman
about.description: Welcome to Flyttman, your trusted moving company, where heart, quality, and dedication define every move we make! We take pride in offering a first-class moving experience, putting your needs at the center of everything we do. With extensive resources and expertise, we assist both individuals and businesses with relocations across Sweden.

summary.title: About Us
summary.content: At Flyttman, we specialize in making your move smooth, efficient, and stress-free, no matter the distance or circumstances. From local and long-distance relocations to international moves, our expert team handles every detail with precision. We cater to both personal and business needs, offering services like company relocations, estate clearances, heavy lifting, and even urgent evacuation moves. For added convenience, we provide storage solutions, move-out cleaning, and privacy-focused moves, ensuring that every aspect of your transition is taken care of with care and professionalism. With Flyttman, moving is made simple and secure.

history.title: Our History
history.content: Founded in 2010, Flyttman has been providing reliable moving services for over a decade. What started as a small local business has grown into a trusted moving company serving multiple cities across the country.

movingTips.title: Tips for a Successful Move
movingTips.description: Moving day can be challenging and stressful. But with proper preparation and follow-up, your move can turn into a smoother experience. At Flyttman, we provide our best tips to make your packing, moving, and unpacking a great day.

startPlanning.title: Start Planning Early
startPlanning.description: If you have your moving date set several weeks in advance, start planning immediately. Make a detailed timeline and checklist for your move:
tips: Set key dates for packing, utility transfers, address changes, final clean-up, and moving day arrangements

declutter.title: Declutter and Organize
declutter.description: Take this opportunity to go through your belongings and decide what to keep, discard, donate, or sell:
tips: Sort items room by room for better organization
Be realistic about what you actually use
Consider selling valuable items you no longer need
Do the sorting before any packing commences to avoid transporting items you don't want in your new home

labelBoxes.title: Label Boxes Strategically
labelBoxes.description: Develop an effective labeling system for your boxes to streamline unpacking:
tips: Mark the room the box belongs to and a general description of contents (e.g., "Kitchen - Cookware")
Number boxes and keep an inventory list for easy tracking
Mark essential boxes with "Open First" to quickly locate necessities on arrival

movingDay.title: Prepare for Moving Day
movingDay.description: To make moving day go smoothly, plan ahead:
tips: Have essential toiletries, a change of clothes, and basic cleaning supplies in a separate, easily accessible bag
Prepare drinks and snacks for the moving team if the move will take several hours
Keep important documents (lease, moving contracts, ID) with you rather than packed away
Charge your phone and have a portable charger on hand

tools.title: Use the Right Moving Tools
tools.description: The right equipment makes your move safer and more efficient:
tips: Moving blankets and furniture pads to protect surfaces from scratches and dents
Quality packing tape and sturdy boxes rather than old, weakened ones

professionals.title: Hire Moving Professionals
professionals.description: For a stress-free moving experience, let the professionals handle it:
tips: Book in advance to secure your preferred date with Flyttman
Discuss specific requirements or concerns with us before moving day

unexpected.title: Handle Unexpected Situations
unexpected.description: Even with detailed planning, unexpected issues may arise on moving day:
tips: Have a contingency plan for bad weather or delays
Keep a small toolkit handy for quick furniture disassembly if needed
Know the dimensions of large furniture pieces and doorways/halls at the new place

essentials.title: Pack an "Essentials Box"
essentials.description: To make your first night in the new home more comfortable, pack a dedicated essentials box:
tips: Basic kitchenware
Toilet paper and toiletries
Bed linens
Charging cables for devices

inspect.title: Inspect The New Home
inspect.description: Before unpacking, take time to inspect your new property:
tips: Check for any existing damage
Confirm utilities are working
Test smoke detectors and carbon monoxide alarms

unpack.title: Unpack Strategically
unpack.description: Have a plan for unpacking to minimize stress:
tips: Start with essentials like bedroom, bathroom, and kitchen to make your first few days comfortable
Assemble furniture before unpacking boxes that will go inside or on that furniture

createHome.title: Create a Home
createHome.description: After the initial unpacking is complete, focus on creating a homey feeling:
tips: Personal touches like photos, art, plants, or familiar decor items
Introduce familiar scents (candles or diffusers) to make your new place smell like home

reflect.title: Reflect and Celebrate
reflect.description: After the move is complete, take time to acknowledge what you've accomplished:
tips: Write down what went well and what you might do differently next time
Host a small housewarming to make positive associations with your new space
reflect.conclusion: By following these tips, you can make your move as smooth and stress-free as possible, allowing you to focus on the excitement of a new beginning.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Frequently Asked Questions for Moving Company

questions.question: What is included in a move with your company?
questions.answer:
Our standard moving service includes: 
- Moving truck: A truck of suitable size based on the volume of your belongings. 
- Transportation: Safe and efficient transport to your new location. 
- Carrying assistance: Our experienced movers will handle loading and unloading. 

We also offer additional services such as packing, furniture assembly/disassembly, and move-out cleaning.

questions.question: Can I get a free quote?
questions.answer: Yes, we always provide free quotes. You can fill out our online form or contact us directly for a personalized quote.

questions.question: How far in advance should I book my move?
questions.answer: We recommend booking your move at least 2–4 weeks in advance, especially during peak seasons.

questions.question: Do you work on weekends and public holidays?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer moving services 7 days a week, including weekends and public holidays. Additional charges may apply for these days.

questions.question: What sizes of moving trucks do you use?
questions.answer: We adapt the truck size to the volume of your belongings. Our fleet includes trucks with capacities ranging from 20 m³ to 90 m³.

questions.question: How do you determine the right truck size for my move?
questions.answer: Based on the details in your request, such as volume, type of items, and property size, we select the most appropriate truck to ensure an efficient move.

questions.question: Can you provide multiple trucks if necessary?
questions.answer: Absolutely! If the volume of items exceeds the capacity of one truck, we can arrange for additional vehicles to accommodate your move.

questions.question: Can you help me pack my belongings?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer packing services where we carefully pack your items into moving boxes. We can also provide packing materials like boxes, bubble wrap, and tape.

questions.question: Do I need to label my moving boxes?
questions.answer: We recommend labeling the boxes with room names and contents to make unpacking easier. If we pack for you, we ensure everything is labeled correctly.

questions.question: Do you move fragile or valuable items?
questions.answer: Yes, we handle fragile items like china, artwork, and mirrors with extra care. Please inform us in advance so we can prepare with the appropriate packing materials.

questions.question: Can you disassemble and reassemble furniture?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer furniture disassembly and reassembly as an additional service. Please let us know during booking.

questions.question: How much does a move cost?
questions.answer: The cost depends on several factors, including volume, distance, and any additional services. Contact us for a tailored quote.

questions.question: Can I use the RUT deduction?
questions.answer: Yes, you can use the RUT deduction of 75,000 SEK per year, per person. It applies to labor costs at a 50% discount; we deduct the amount directly at payment and apply for the RUT deduction using your personal identification number. It is your responsibility to ensure that you are eligible for the RUT deduction. You can call SKV at 0771-567567 for inquiries.

questions.question: How do I pay for my move?
questions.answer:
- For private individuals: Payment is made upon unloading via Swish or card.
- For businesses and government entities: We offer 30-day net invoicing.

questions.question: Are there any hidden fees?
questions.answer: No, we strive to provide transparent pricing with no surprises. All costs are detailed in the quote.

questions.question: How long does a move take?
questions.answer: The duration depends on the volume of items, the distance between addresses, and any additional services. A standard local move usually takes 4–8 hours.

questions.question: How do you ensure my items are transported safely?
questions.answer: We use professional equipment such as straps, blankets, and specialized vehicles to protect your belongings during transport.

questions.question: Can you move heavy items like pianos or safes?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer heavy-lifting services as an add-on. Please inform us in advance so we can prepare the appropriate equipment and personnel.

questions.question: Are my belongings insured during the move?
questions.answer:
Yes, our services are insured according to industry standards:
- BOHAG 2010: For moves within Sweden.
- ALLTRANS 2007: For moves within Nordic countries.
- UNECES International: For moves within Europe.

questions.question: What does the insurance cover?
questions.answer: The insurance covers damages caused during transport, loading, or unloading. We recommend reporting any damages immediately so we can address the issue.

questions.question: Can I purchase extra insurance for valuable items?
questions.answer: Yes, we offer additional insurance for high-value items. Please contact us before your move to discuss your needs.

questions.question: What is your cancellation policy?
questions.answer:
Moving requires thorough planning, so we have the following cancellation rules:
- For local and national moves: Cancellations made later than 5 days after booking confirmation (via email) will be charged 25% of the total price.
- For international moves: Cancellations must be made within 24 hours after receiving the booking confirmation. Cancellations within 48 hours of the move will be charged 100% of the moving cost.

questions.question: What happens if I need to change my booking?
questions.answer: If you need to make changes to your booking, we are happy to assist. Please notify us as early as possible to allow for proper adjustments.

questions.question: How do I book a move?
questions.answer: You can book by filling out our online form, calling us, or sending us an email. We confirm your booking within 24 hours.

questions.question: Can I book a move on short notice?
questions.answer: Yes, we try to accommodate short-notice moves if we have availability. Contact us to check.

Flyttman is the moving company that combines quality, affordability, and dedication to provide you with a safe and seamless moving experience—whether you’re relocating within Stockholm or to nearby cities like Solna, Sundbyberg, Nacka, or Täby.

whyUs.commitmentDescription: We move with heart and passion to give the customer the best possible experience.
whyUs.qualityDescription: We ensure the highest quality at every step, from planning to implementation.

commitmentSection.title: Commitment – Making Your Move Personal
commitmentSection.content:
At Flyttman, moving is not just about transporting belongings from point A to point B. We move with heart and passion, aiming to create a stress-free experience for you. Our team is dedicated, meticulous, and always ready to adapt to your needs. Stockholm is a dynamic city with unique challenges—from narrow streets in Gamla Stan to modern apartments in Hammarby Sjöstad—and we have the expertise to handle them all.

Every move is unique, and we offer tailored solutions to fit your specific situation. Whether you need help packing, moving bulky furniture, or just transport services, we are here for you.

qualitySection.title: Quality – From Planning to Execution
qualitySection.content: Quality is one of our core values, and we strive to exceed your expectations at every step of the process. When you choose Flyttman, you get:
listItems: Professional and experienced staff who handle your belongings with the utmost care.
Modern and well-equipped moving trucks suitable for all types of transportation.
Flexible services, including comprehensive moving solutions, cleaning, and storage options.
qualitySection.conclusion: We are proud to be the moving company in Stockholm that delivers excellence, whether it’s a small apartment move in Södermalm or a larger villa relocation in Bromma.

affordabilitySection.title: Affordability – Premium Service at the Right Price
affordabilitySection.content:
In a city like Stockholm, where costs can easily spiral, Flyttman is committed to offering competitive rates without compromising on quality. Our goal is to ensure that everyone can afford a safe and efficient move. Thanks to our streamlined processes, we keep costs low and provide clear, transparent quotes—no surprises or hidden fees.

Don’t forget, as a private individual, you can use the RUT tax deduction to further reduce your costs. We’re happy to help you calculate exactly how much you can save.

suppliers.title: Framework Agreement for Moving Assignments – Flyttman

background.title: Background
background.paragraph1: Flyttman is a digital platform that connects customers and moving suppliers. By registering an account, suppliers can bid on assignments, create driver logins, and easily assign tasks. Suppliers commit to performing assignments professionally and following up on complaints according to industry terms. After each assignment, the customer gives a rating (1–5 stars) and can submit any complaints.
background.paragraph2: This agreement regulates the terms for cooperation between Flyttman and connected suppliers.

section1.title: § 1 – Purpose of the Agreement
section1.point1: Flyttman enables suppliers to bid directly on customer assignments via the platform. Customer relations are always handled by Flyttman. No direct contractual relationship arises between customer and supplier.

section2.title: § 2 – Services
services: - Own transport vehicle (incl. fuel) with sufficient capacity
- At least one person per assignment who speaks Swedish
- Transport to/from loading and unloading locations
- Loading, unloading, rough furnishing and placement
- Moving between vehicle and property
- Complementary equipment (blankets, dollies, straps, etc.)
- Extra services are agreed separately
- Only bid on assignments where capacity exists

section3.title: § 3 – Assignment Booking and Contact
section3.point1: All customer contact occurs via the platform's internal messaging system. Assignments may not be transferred to third parties without written approval from Flyttman. If a supplier contacts customers outside the system and bypasses commission, 2 base amounts in penalty and immediate suspension apply.
section3.point2: Prices should be adapted for RUT deduction. In case of denied payment from the Tax Agency due to the supplier's incorrect pricing, the supplier is responsible for the difference.

section4.title: § 4 – Compensation and Payment
section4.point1: Compensation is paid no later than 14 days after approved and completed assignment. Invoicing must be correct and match the agreed service. Flyttman is responsible for further invoicing to customers.

section5.title: § 5 – Terms, Liability and Insurance
services: - The supplier must hold valid goods traffic permits and liability insurance
- Changes in permits or insurance must be immediately reported to Flyttman
- The supplier is responsible for ensuring vehicles, equipment and personnel meet safety requirements and industry standards
- The supplier is liable for damage to customer property arising from negligence
- The supplier must at all times have liability insurance covering damage to household goods, personal injury and third parties
- In case of intentional damage or gross negligence, customers are compensated 100%
- The supplier is responsible for communicating delays, obstacles or damage to Flyttman without delay

section6.title: § 6 – Termination and Dispute
services: - Flyttman reserves the right to terminate cooperation in case of breach of contract
- The agreement is governed by Swedish law
- Disputes are resolved primarily by the parties, secondarily in Gothenburg District Court

footer.agreement: **This framework agreement takes effect upon approval in connection with registration on the platform.**

general.title: General Terms and Conditions for Moving Services

parties.title: 1. Parties
parties.content: This agreement is entered into between Flyttman AB, hereinafter referred to as the "Supplier", and {name}, hereinafter referred to as the "Customer".

scope.title: 2. Scope of the service
scope.content: The supplier offers moving services according to the specification agreed between the parties. The Service may include, but is not limited to, packing, loading, transporting, unloading, and unpacking of goods.

customerResponsibilities.title: 3. Customer's Responsibilities
items: The Client is responsible for providing accurate information about the scope and destination of the move.
The Client shall ensure that the Supplier has access to all spaces and that any permits for parking and loading are in order.
The Client is responsible for ensuring that all items are properly packed and protected if packing is not included in the service.
Items of special value (e.g. jewellery, art, cash) shall be handled separately by the Customer and not included in the removal goods.

payment.title: 4. Payment
items: The customer must pay according to the offer accepted.
Payment is made by invoice, company, or card, private individual.
In case of late payment, late payment interest of 2% per month will be charged.

cancellation.title: 5. Cancellation and rescheduling
items: The customer can cancel the service free of charge up to 14 days before the move date.
If canceled within 14 days, a fee corresponding to the advance will be charged at the time of booking.
Rebooking can be made free of charge up to 7 days before the moving date, after which an administrative fee of 20% of the total cost may be added.

liability.title: 6. Limitations of Liability
items: The Supplier is only liable for damage that occurs to the removal goods if the damage was caused by negligence.

Compensation is paid up to a maximum of a basic amount per damaged item and only if the damage is reported after the service has been performed when a rating is given after the removal has been carried out (no later than 5 days).
The Supplier is not responsible for indirect damages, delays beyond the Supplier's control, or damage to items that have not been packed by the Supplier.

complaints.title: 7. Complaints
complaints.content: Any complaints are notified in connection with the submission of the review, but no later than 5 days after the service has been performed.

disputeResolution.title: 8. Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.content: Disputes between the parties shall primarily be resolved by negotiation. If an agreement is not reached, the dispute shall be settled in accordance with Swedish law and in a Swedish court in the Gothenburg District Court.

miscellaneous.title: 9. Miscellaneous
miscellaneous.content: These terms and conditions may be updated from time to time, and the latest version is always available on the Provider's website.
